name: Tech Expansion Guide
subtitle: by _____
landing_text: This guide book will provide you with direction and tips to progress through $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/tech-expansion)Tech Expansion (TE)$(), a tech-based gated modpack. This pack is very similar to its $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/age-of-engineering)predecessor$(). Reading this guide is $(l)not$() mandatory. You can complete the pack solely by reading JEI and following FTB Quests if you want.
